name: Sun-Dried Tomato & Olive Artisan Crisps
description: Experience the bold flavors of the Mediterranean with our Sun-Dried Tomato & Olive Artisan Crisps. Handcrafted in small batches, these crunchy snacks combine ripe, sun-dried tomatoes and Kalamata olives with a touch of sea salt and extra virgin olive oil. Perfect for pairing with cheeses, hummus, or enjoying straight from the bag, these crisps offer a savory, aromatic bite that elevates any snack platter. Non-GMO and free of artificial additives, they’re ideal for discerning palates seeking a gourmet treat.

attributes.ingredients: Wheat flour, sun-dried tomatoes, Kalamata olives, sea salt, extra virgin olive oil, rosemary
attributes.allergens: Contains wheat; may contain traces of nuts
